title: Mycelium Marketing
description: I help small and medium-sized businesses grow and thrive online in my role as Shopify Developer and CRO Strategist at Mycelium Marketing.

title: TPL Barcode Generator
description: This tool generates phone wallpapers that double as digital Toronto Public Library cards that can be used with barcode scanners.

title: U.S. National Parks Visits Analysis
description: In this simple data aggregation and visualization project, I show that more people will visit U.S. national parks when the weather is warm.
